[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color_gradient_direction=”34deg” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/red-deer-FLIP-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”11vw||11vw||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ admin_label=”Hero Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”46px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Title” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_font_size=”77px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#6b0906″ header_2_font_size=”74px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” header_font_size_tablet=”69px” header_font_size_phone=”40px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN THIS MYTHIC LIFE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Subtitle” _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding_tablet=”|30%|||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”|17%|||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_2_font_size_phone=”21px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Live a life that’s full of mystery, bursting with possibility – an authentic life that will challenge you to wholeheartedly embrace your calling.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”About Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|0px|5%|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|0%||0%|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_2_font_size=”48px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”|14%|2%|14%|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”2%|5%|4%|5%|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”4%||7%||false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘This Mythic Life’ 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” text_text_color=”#ffb69e” text_font_size=”26px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” width=”41%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||30px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|6%||6%|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”22px” text_font_size_phone=”20px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A life-changing journey of personal transformation

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.6em” header_text_align=”left” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_align=”left” header_4_text_color=”#ffb693″ header_4_font_size=”25px” header_4_line_height=”1.4em” width=”80%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”|7%|0px|7%|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”|0%||0%|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Sign up now at the bottom of this page

 

As a psychologist specialising in myth and the deep imagination, I’m passionate about helping people to uncover and step into rich new visions for their lives. Our old Western wisdom traditions tell us that it’s through exercising the embodied and emplaced imagination – through working with myth, archetypes, dreams, fairy tales, and through exploring creative and expressive practices – that we can come to understand our unique gift and purpose, and weave ourselves back into the anima mundi – the soul of the world; this beautiful, animate cosmos to which we belong. I believe that this is the essential Great Work of our times – that, as we stand on the brink of planetary catastrophe, we learn to transform ourselves from the ground up. And so transform the world.

This Mythic Life, then, is a unique on-demand, self-study course which guides you to revive these old enchantments, and unlock the magic of the everyday. (Please note that this self-study course is derived from and largely duplicates an intensive, interactive membership program which ran throughout 2020.)

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||3px||false|false” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|0%||0%|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.6em” header_text_align=”left” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_align=”left” header_4_text_color=”#ffb693″ header_4_font_size=”25px” header_4_line_height=”1.4em” header_5_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_5_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_5_font_size=”26px” header_5_line_height=”1.5em” width=”80%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”-83px|||||” custom_padding=”|7%|0px|7%|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”|0%||0%|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This Mythic Life is for you if:

 

– You’d like to learn how to cultivate your mythic imagination, and understand the mythic and archetypal patterns at work beneath the surface of your life and in the world around you;

– You’d like to move beyond the merely theoretical, to be invited to create new ways of thinking about the world and your place in it, and new practices which will help you to live more deeply and richly, every day;

– You’d like to learn how to understand and work with archetypes, with fairy tales, and with ideas, techniques and practices from Jungian and archetypal psychology in your life, outside of a therapeutic context.

If you are wondering how this course relates to my other online course, Courting the World Soul … Courting the World Soul is a foundation course: a detailed introduction to individual practices and techniques for cultivating the mythic imagination. This Mythic Life applies the ideas from Courting the World Soul, delving deeper into specific stories, archetypal energies and depth psychology practices. So although the two courses are independent of each other, if you’re trying to choose between them, Courting the World Soul is the best place to begin.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”||80px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_divider color=”#fcfcf2″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#ffb69e” text_font_size=”22px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_4_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”|7%|0px|7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘I am profoundly grateful to you, Sharon, for this exciting, well-researched, and beautifully presented series of workshops – but also to the many insightful and curious people who are sharing this dimension of our journeys. Your thoughtful design of this class – the webinars – the many challenging and creative suggestions for deeper work – as well as the community that is evolving through this work – provide ways to explore and develop a renewed sense of calling.’

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|7%||7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

GAIL, USA, on Courting the world soul

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#fcfcf2″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”About Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|0px||” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#893e39″ background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

WHY JOIN?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#fcfcf2″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_margin=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.6em” header_text_align=”left” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_align=”left” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”25px” header_4_line_height=”1.4em” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This Mythic Life is an on-demand, self-study course which contains twelve Modules and was designed to run for twelve months – though you will be able to engage with it entirely at your own pace. It is for people who want to delve deeply into my unique approach to cultivating the mythic imagination. No prior experience is necessary. Whether or not you’ve read my books, or participated in my other online courses or in-person workshops, This Mythic Life will provide you with ongoing resources to help you make deep, meaningful and sustainable changes in your life, and support you on your journey to embrace your calling. The course offers you:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_letter_spacing=”1px” custom_padding=”30px||||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_4_font_size_tablet=”” header_4_font_size_phone=”22px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

A DEEP EXPLORATION OF THE MYTHIC IMAGINATION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.6em” header_text_align=”left” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_align=”left” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”25px” header_4_line_height=”1.4em” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You’ll work with the following subjects: The Wild Man and Wild Woman archetypes, The Ancestral Arts, the story of The Handless Maiden, Psyche & Cosmos: archetypal cosmology, The Embodied Imagination, The Trickster and the Shadow, The Post-Heroic Journey, The Simplicity of Ceremony, The Witch as Archetype, Psyche & Eros: the Soul’s Journey Home, Alchemy & the Mythic Imagination, and The Time Between Stories: navigating transitions.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_padding=”30px||||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_4_font_size_tablet=”” header_4_font_size_phone=”22px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

EXPERT GUIDANCE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.6em” header_text_align=”left” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_align=”left” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”25px” header_4_line_height=”1.4em” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

This Mythic Life is founded on authentic scholarship based on my decades of ongoing professional training and practice in psychology (neuroscience, narrative, depth and transpersonal psychology) and mythology, as well as committed engagement in the mythopoetic and other creative and expressive arts, and a deep and grounded personal practice. (You can check out my academic and professional qualifications and experience here.)

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_padding=”30px||||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_4_font_size_tablet=”” header_4_font_size_phone=”22px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

FRAMEWORK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.6em” header_text_align=”left” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_align=”left” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”25px” header_4_line_height=”1.4em” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The old forgotten mythologies and philosophies of the West are rich, complex and beautiful. They offer up a world in which everything is alive, and has purpose and intentionality of its own. A world to which each incarnated soul chooses to come, for a reason: to fulfil its own unique calling, and to offer up a gift which can only be expressed through a deep, embodied relationship with and participation in that animate world. It’s time to reclaim those old, indigenous ways of being in the world – the ancient foundation-stones of Western spirituality – and make them the guiding stars we live by.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_padding=”30px||||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_4_font_size_tablet=”” header_4_font_size_phone=”22px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

TOOLS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.6em” header_text_align=”left” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_font=”||||||||” header_4_text_align=”left” header_4_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_4_font_size=”25px” header_4_line_height=”1.4em” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Each Module, you’re offered an invitation to focus on a specific ‘challenge’, along with the ability to watch previously a recorded live webinar, audio downloads, practical tools and creative exercises to help you find your way through it.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.27.2″ background_color=”#282723″ background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/VOTW-header-2-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”21%|5%|21%|5%|true|false” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”88%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_font=”|||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

WHAT YOU’LL RECEIVE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”58%” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”24px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_5_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_5_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_5_font_size=”24px” header_5_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-40px||58px||false|false” header_line_height_tablet=”” header_line_height_phone=”1.1em” header_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Bonus introductory module

As well as the twelve-Module course, you will also be able to download a ‘bonus’ introductory Module, which consists of two booklets: Cultivating Your Inner Imaginarium, and DreamWeaving: a Practice for Dreaming Awake. In addition, there is an accompanying audio download which teaches you a new technique for actively engaging with the imaginal world.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” max_width=”88%” custom_padding_tablet=”|9%||9%|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|4%||4%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”TWELVE MODULE WORKBOOKS” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Stormy-bog-SQ-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” background_color=”#ffffff” min_height=”909px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

For each Module you’ll be invited to view or download a workbook containing background material, practical tools and creative exercises to help you exercise your mythic imagination, as well as in-depth background material and reading resources to help you fully explore the subject you’re working with.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”YOUR INVITATION TO ENGAGE” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/durdlearchdorset-SQ-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#282723″ background_enable_color=”off” custom_css_blurb_title=”padding-bottom:20px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

During each Module, you’ll work deeply with a particular aspect of cultivating the mythic imagination which will form the focus for our transformative journey together. You’ll be invited to engage with a ‘challenge’ to explore the relevance of this work in your own life.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”RECORDED WEBINARS” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Connemara-rock.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#282723″ custom_css_blurb_title=”padding-bottom:20px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Each Module, you’ll be able to watch a sixty-minute video webinar which was originally recorded in 2020, when the year-long interactive version of this course was first offered. Each webinar consists of teaching which is supplementary to the Module workbook, and a live discussion with participants in the original program.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”EXCLUSIVE AUDIO” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Iceland-glacier-lagoon-SQ-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” header_text_color=”#893e39″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#282723″ background_enable_color=”off” custom_css_blurb_title=”padding-bottom:20px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Cultivating the deep mythic imagination is critical to the ongoing transformational process. Each Module includes a new audio file featuring a guided imagination journey to help you develop and exercise your imaginal muscles.

And you’ll work even more deeply with story: each Module includes two exclusive podcasts, MythLines, in which I read a favourite myth or fairy tale, and discuss its themes and relevance to issues we face in our lives today.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”80px||36px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#ffb69e” text_font_size=”22px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_4_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”|7%|0px|7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

COMMENTS ON COURTING THE WORLD SOUL

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#ffb69e” text_font_size=”22px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_4_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”|7%|0px|7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘You have been a wonderful embodiment of a wise woman, guiding me from an island I deeply love, guiding me by her warm, wise voice and teaching me with her sharp, delicate and humble answers. Each week, reminding me that my skin was never lost forever. She is just there … getting to know the oak in the park, chatting with the crows, playing hide and seek with the foxes, reclaiming stories and images I loved, feeling her calling in a clearer voice, week after week.’

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”18px” min_height=”29px” custom_margin=”8px||3px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|7%||7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

CELIA, France

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#ffb69e” text_font_size=”22px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_4_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”29px|7%|0px|7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘Thank you for such a deep and rich course. It’s hard to put into words the impact it has had, continues to have, and the transformative experience it has been. There was such a wealth of information and insight in the webinars and course handouts – so clearly articulated – and the exercises really helped deepen the experience. I have certainly come to a more profound understanding of how exploring mythic patterns in our lives can help connect with our authentic selves and to purpose and place in the world, on a deeper level. It has enabled me to encounter the animate world in a surprising and wonderfully welcoming way … I feel very privileged to have been part of it.’

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”18px” min_height=”9px” custom_margin=”10px||-1px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|7%||7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

CATHERINE, United Kingdom

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_text_color=”#ffb69e” text_font_size=”22px” text_line_height=”1.5em” header_4_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_4_font_size=”24px” header_4_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”32px|7%|0px|7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

‘During this course, a massive shift in my perception occurred and it feels as if all those threads that have been drifting around have joined to form a tapestry, a pattern, something beautiful, of great value, to be appreciated for what it is.’

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Raleway|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_font_size=”18px” custom_margin=”8px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|7%||7%|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”]

BIRGITTA, Germany

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#44393d” custom_padding=”100px||140px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”88%” max_width=”88%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#ffb69e” header_2_font_size=”37px” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Modules

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” width=”100%” max_width=”88%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 1″ image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/booth-www.prises2vues.fr-9406-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”670px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”SBbooth-www.prises2vues.fr-9406-OPT” sticky_enabled=”0″]

THE WILD WOMAN AND THE WILD MAN

Uncivilising ourselves through these ancient archetypes in European myth and folklore.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 2″ image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Night-labyrinth-square.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”670px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”OwnSpiral labyrinth made of stones on the coast at starry night” sticky_enabled=”0″]

ANCESTRAL ARTS

How do we come to terms with the three types of ancestors – those from our genetic lineage, the ancestors of our places, and our spiritual ancestors?

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 3″ image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/SBnet-square-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”670px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”USSBnet-square-OPT” sticky_enabled=”0″]

THE HANDLESS MAIDEN

A deep dive into this beautiful old folk tale, asking: ‘What does it mean, to walk into the forest and learn to grow back our severed hands?’ And ‘What does it mean, to be a good husband?’

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 4″ image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Mamean-light.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”670px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”OwnMamean light” sticky_enabled=”0″]

ARCHETYPAL COSMOLOGY & ASTROLOGY

An exploration of the mythic and archetypal underpinnings of astrology, and the ways in which our own individual soul-journey is reflected in the ever-unfolding psyche of the cosmos.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” width=”100%” max_width=”88%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 5″ image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Hagitude-square.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”707px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”USHagitude square” sticky_enabled=”0″]

THE EMBODIED IMAGINATION

How can we bring the art of imagination out of our heads and into our bodies? How can we use imagination for healing, and to enter into a deeper relationship with, our bodies?

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 6″ image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/crow-at-night-square.jpg” _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”707px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

THE TRICKSTER AND THE SHADOW

An exploration of the Trickster archetype in European mythology. How do we engage with the Trickster archetypes – the necessary disruptors – who show up in our lives at any given time? How does Trickster reflect our individual, and the cultural, Shadow?

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 7″ image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Brigid-square.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”707px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”Own Rural landscape at sunrise, Ireland” sticky_enabled=”0″]

THE POST-HEROIC JOURNEY

Is it time we moved on from the heroic and individualistic, and began to dream about what a post-heroic journey might look like, for both men and women? What are the archetypes, the stories that we need for these post-heroic times?

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 8″ image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Connemara-rock.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”707px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”Own Connemara-rock” sticky_enabled=”0″]

THE SIMPLICITY OF CEREMONY

Creating authentic ritual and ceremony in everyday life.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” width=”100%” max_width=”88%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 9″ url=”https://sharonblackie.net/welcome-to-this-mythic-life-gold/module-9-september-2020-gold/” image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Hebrides-lightning-1200-Row.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”730px” custom_margin=”||44px|||” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”Own Hebrides-lightning-1200-Row” sticky_enabled=”0″]

THE WITCH AS ARCHETYPE

An exploration of the archetype of the witch in European myth and folklore.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 10″ image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/red-deer-SQ.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”730px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”red-deer-SQ” sticky_enabled=”0″]

PSYCHE AND EROS: THE SOUL’S JOURNEY HOME

An exploration of this rich and beautiful old myth.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 11″ image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Ecosse-2-OPT.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”730px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”SBEcosse-2-OPT” sticky_enabled=”0″]

ALCHEMY AND THE MYTHIC IMAGINATION

What is the nature of the alchemical process? How can we uncover truths about our own personal transformations by exploring the richly metaphorical language of alchemy?

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Module 12″ image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/Bone-Cave-Left.jpg” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ header_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_text_color=”#c34d49″ header_font_size=”22px” body_text_color=”#893e39″ background_color=”#fcfcf2″ min_height=”730px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”Bone-Cave-Left” sticky_enabled=”0″]

THE TIME BETWEEN STORIES

Navigating transitions, from midlife onwards: from madness to fallow ground.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#282723″ custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”50px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_font=”|||on|||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||20px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN THIS COURSE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.23″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ text_line_height=”1.5em” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” header_4_text_color=”#d9c2a3″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”|87px|0px|87px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|15px|0px|15px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You can join this course and begin working with it at any time; you’ll have access to your material for the lifetime of this website.

This self-study, on-demand course is priced at £100. (For those of you in other countries: currency exchange rates change by the hour, and so we’re not able to tell you what the cost of this course is in your currency. This currency converter offers you live rates, though they may or may not reflect the rates actually given to you by your bank or credit card provider. It will, however, give you an indication.)

When you sign up to This Mythic Life, you’ll be prompted to create a login which will allow you access to the ‘Membership’ section of my website. IF YOU ALREADY HAVE AN ACCOUNT ON THIS SITE, YOU MUST USE THE SAME EMAIL ADDRESS AND USERNAME THAT YOU’RE ALREADY REGISTERED WITH, IN ORDER TO SEE ALL YOUR COURSES UNDER THE SAME MENU.

If you have a discount code, you must enter it by clicking on the ‘Have a coupon’ link above the ‘Select payment method’ section below, before completing your payment.  We cannot apply discount codes after the event, or create partial refunds in the case of errors.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FCFCF2″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

* Please agree to the terms and conditions below to continue:

Please note in particular, before purchasing, that no refunds can be given for this course.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Workshops and Events Section” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|” saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”0″ make_equal=”on” admin_label=”About Area” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px||0px” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” use_custom_width=”on” width_unit=”off” custom_width_percent=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://sharonblackie.net/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wolves-left-OPT.jpg” custom_padding=”7%|5%|7%|5%|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”33%||33%||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ background_color=”#44393d” background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”5%|5%|5%|5%|true” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

JOIN MY PACK

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#c34d49″ divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”50px” custom_padding=”20px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.21.0″ text_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font=”|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ header_2_font_size=”34px” custom_margin=”||41px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Subscribe to my free monthly newsletter, ‘The Art of Enchantment’, on Substack, and be among the first to hear all the latest news about my books, courses and events – as well as personal seasonal reflections and reading recommendations. You’ll also receive a special gift as a thank you for joining me!

If you’d like to become a paid subscriber, you’ll have access to exclusive articles, podcasts, chat and much more.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://sharonblackie.substack.com” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”JOIN MY LIST” _builder_version=”4.17.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#fcfcf2″ button_bg_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_width=”4px” button_border_color=”#c34d49″ button_border_radius=”100px” button_font=”|300||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: This Mythic Life is a unique course grounded in mythology and archetypal/depth psychology, aimed at cultivating the mythic imagination.
